ygData.subject: Total Chaos in Africa

Subject: Total Chaos in Africa
To: nbwrpg@egroups.com

From: KSLawdogg@...

(Alloran, if you make a post titled "To Dachande", please don't put your 
characters who are battling other people in the post.  The title of the 
subject made it seem like an OOC comment, and people may have just deleted it 
thinking it had nothing to do with them.

See IR?  MY surprise is below!  BWAHAHAHAHA!  I'm so crazy it makes me laugh!

(Hey, Alloran, I'm starting to hear "The Touch" and "Dare" just about now...)

Oblitertron/Sixshot/Dark Wolf/Double 
Punch/Injector/Manterror/Bumblebee/Ares/Nemesis 
Enforcer/Scattershot/Firestarter/
Chordate/Unitron/Defensor (gestlat Protectobots)/Vehement/Sun 
Crusher/Reflector/
Serpentor:




Four Protectobots drove up only several meters from the closest seen of 
battle at the Cybertronian Fire.  The other Maximal flew overhead in his 
helicopter mode, Blades having the ability to launch smart bombs from a great 
distance.  But he wasn't going to, because he felt it cowardly.

Hot Spot transformed from his blue firetruck  mode to his biped mode.  He 
looked around, seeing Oblitertron, Mobster, and Dark Wolf, not that it was 
hard.
He made a whistle like sound.

"I've never seen so many!" Groove yelled from his motorcycle mode.  He could 
see all the inured Maximals and the devastated CF.  "First they take out our 
ship, now this!  LET'S KICK TAILGATE!" he yelled, followed by the yells of 
everyone who approved.

Hot Spot agreed, but he didn't want to start unmercifully killing everyone.  
He knew who they were going to attack.  The big black forty-five footer who 
as drawing the most attention.  Oblitertron.

"Protectobots, unite!" he yelled, leaping into the air, taking the form of a 
head and torso.

Groove transformed out of his vehicle mode, leaping into the air, taking the 
form of a right arm and attaching.

Blades flew for the current form of the Protectobot gestalt mode, 
transforming to biped mode than the shape of a left arm, still having 
momentum in the air.  He attached to complete the left arm of the gestalt.

First Aid transformed to his biped mode from ambulance, leaping into the air, 
taking the shape of the right leg.  He attached, the gestalt slowly coming 
downward towards the ground.

Streetwise drove at 60 MPH, transforming to biped mode and jumping as hard as 
he could, taking the form of a leg and attaching to the gestalt.  

The forty-five foot gestalt landed feet first on the burned ground that had 
once been a beautiful green grassland.  "Defensor will protect the innocent!" 
he yelled, running forward at a high speed.

He leaped into the air, outstretching a leg, heading for Oblitertron.

---

Oblitertron turned his massive head, his sadistic smile changing into a look 
of shock as he saw a MAXIMAL gestalt coming straight towards.  Still froze 
with shock, he cried out as Defensor's foot connected with his face, sending 
him flipping through the air, crashing down on his back.  In result all shots 
missed him from the smaller Maxis and base defenses.

Oblitertron could hear only Defensor.  "He's mine!" he could hear the Maximal 
gestalt yell out.

---

Dark Wolf was shocked.  A Maximal gestalt.  He'd never expected.  He formed a 
blue orb in his hand and raised it, but caught a missile in his back from the 
CF, and howled in pain.  He turned, throwing the orb, watching it explode 
against the shieldless hull of the Maximal warship, the armor peeling off and 
the missile launcher being destroyed.

---

Double Punch didn't see the battle between the Maximal and merk gestalts.  He 
was focusing on battle.  He watched as his cyber-bee, Beeline, dove, firing 
off optic blasts, intercepting the missiles.

Double Punch smiled, it was his turn.  He flipped to the left with amazing 
acrobatic ability, only three of the original twenty-five shots striking him 
in his relatively undamaged chest (relative to the other people battling).  
He raised both pinchers, firing two energy-signature seeking missiles from 
his left pincher at Sideswipe.

He raised the other and fired off two energy-signature seeking missiles at 
Ratchet.  He sighed, knowing he couldn't avoid all shots.  And he wasn't 
looking forward to the pain.  He didn't notice the nails, all eight plunging 
into his back.  But he stood his ground.

---

Injector dove, avoiding all the nails, replying with ten rapid optic blasts 
at Ratchet.

---

Bumblebee transformed to his animal mode as the nails hit, now in a refresh 
body of a  large bumblebee, the size of his old biped body he had just been 
in.  He raised his behind, the large stinger pointing out at Torca.  He 
launched off two stinger missiles at Torca.

---

Manterror avoided the lasers and shot down a missile, but he wasn't as 
evasive as his comrades because of his bulk, and took the missile in his 
armored abdomen with pain.  He raised both arms, firing down four ion disks 
from both arms, eight ion disks heading down for Ratchet.

-I can't do that to often, have to conserve energy- he quickly thought.

---

Ares saw the shells heading for Sixshot, and fired off four precise shots 
from his laesr rifle to intercept the shells.

---

Sixshot yelled out as two shells struck him armored form.  Everyone seemed 
interesting in extinguishing his precious spark.  He swerved both batteries, 
firing off four shots from both cannons inside each battery.

Eight laser blasts lanced out from his left battery at Gigan's torso.  
Simultaneously he fired another eight blasts from his right battery at 
Gigan's torso.  He was getting tired of these chumps messing with him.

---

Nemesis Enforcer continued to gain altitude, but cried out.  "WHAT THE 
SLAG!?" he yelled as some unidentified gestalt appeared out of slagging 
nowhere.

Nemesis activated the comm. link to Zardus' inner monologue comm. unit 
quickly.
"ZARDUS!" he yelled.  "GET THE WAR MACHINES HERE ASAP!  UNIDENTIFIED MAXIMAL 
GESTALT IS BEATING UP OBLITERTRON!" he exaggerated, looking down at his 
missile launcher and rifle.  "That's not going to do it..." he sighed.  Oh, 
well, he'd continue trying to kill the Maximal leader.

---

Scattershot watched Oblitertron get momentarily taken down.  "Sweeet." he 
chuckled, throwing his head back in evil laughter as he rocketed top speed 
into the sky.

---

Serpentor jumped back from Lunaprine's slash at his chest and laughed as he 
slashed at his weapon with his claws.  He brought his sword up to block the 
claws and fired an optic blast at Luna's chest.

---

"A Maximal gestalt?  The Protectobots?"

"Yes." Firestarter replied.

"You were supposed to kill them."

"It doesn't matter.  They don't concern us for now."

"Do not concern us?!  Are you an idiot?  Incompetence is the reason I killed 
the Newcomer cause."

"Enough.  Focus on our cause.  We must gain entry to the Cybertronian Fire." 
As Firestarter spoke, he raised both arms, two compartments coming down, and 
a missile from both launching out, exploding against the main entry way of 
the CF.

Unitron, who was hovering in space fighter mode, got a target lock, and 
launched two missiles of his own, adding onto the damage of the main entry 
way to the Maximal warship.

=

Vehement landed, surrounded by his two minions, and looked around.
"Neutrality is no longer our way.  Though we haven't been here long, so it 
doesn't matter.  With the coming of the Divine One, our cause will not need 
to be merely neutral, fan out, yet stay close and aid the Alliance."

Vehement spotted FZ and opened a comm. link to him.  "This is Vehement.  We 
are going to aid you." he ended the transmission as he finished, raising a 
hand.

The hand changed into the shape of a large barrel, an energy-signature 
seeking missile launching out at Lunaprine's torso.

---

Sun Crusher nodded at the orders, taking out his laser rifle.  He still 
didn't have an alternate transformation mode.  He raised the rifle, firing 
off two rapid bolts off at Torca.

---

Reflector watched the Archbishop Vehement and his comrade Sun Crusher take 
fight.  He decided to not focus on the same cluster of enemy as they were.  
He spotted Nemesis Enforcer and opened a comm. link.

"This is Relfector of the group you have a tribute deal with.  I will aid 
you." he said, launching into the air at full speed for the winged 
second-in-command.

==

Chordate yelled out as multiple blasts struck the Cybertronian Fire.  He 
didn't pay much attention to it though because he was focused on Defensor.  
"Things just got interesting..." he said, making a face of pain for a split 
second.

He checked the sensors in front of him.  "Someone is attempting to gain entry 
at the main access way of the ship.  Are they idiots? He asked himself, 
making note the hull of the CF was at 84% integrity.

He activated his comm. to Kluster.  "Kluster, this is Chordate.  Request 
permission to do Level One Lockdown of the base." Chordate wondered if 
Kluster would allow it.  A Level One would add over two foot of extra armor 
along each access hatch, making entry amazingly hard.  It would also seal all 
the access hatches though, and would make entry and leaving impossible for 
enemy and friend alike.
